title: “We are building a tech bridge between Russia and India”—Herman Gref of Sberbank on bilateral tech ties
description: Sberbank CEO Herman Gref highlights Russia's leadership in payment technologies and generative AI, emphasizing unique solutions like biometric payments and the open-source GigaChat model. He discusses collaborations with India, the development of AI robots, a…
content: Russia, today, is a world leader in payment technologies, stated Herman Gref, CEO and Chairman of the Executive Board at Sberbank, Russias and Eastern Europes biggest bank, in an exclusive interview … [+19157 chars]
